name: The Voice Inside
description:
Requirements
  • Currently only playable with Windows 10!
  • Headset/Microphone (no keyboard/controller needed, voice-operated!)
The Game
The Voice Inside is an innovative voice-controlled psychological horror game, that takes you on a journey deep down into your heart, mind & soul.
Command your character through different paths to find the "Inner Values", by using only your voice & let the voice inside guide you to find your way out.
But be careful, the enemy is close - Darkness is chasing you!
Just listen, follow your intuition & give the right commands to reach your goal!Voice Commands
Use a good headset or microphone & speak loud and clear. Avoid loud background noises to make the speech recognition system work well.

  • Move (go/walk) – normal speed
  • Hurry – let your character run
  • Stop (wait/hold on) - stop the character immediately
  • Sneak - slow movement to avoid the enemy’s attention
  • Speed Up – increase your current speed
  • Turn Right (right) – turns 90° right

and many more...
Just listen to the voice inside. It tells you what to do.
